mapper.select: SELECT MEM_CODE, ID, PW, NICKNAME, MBTI_CODE FROM MEMBER ORDER BY MEM_CODE
SELECT M.MEM_CODE, M.ID, M.PW, M.NICKNAME, M.MBTI_CODE, ADMIN_CODE FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN ADMIN A ON M.MEM_CODE = A.MEM_CODE WHERE PW = #{arg1} AND ID = #{arg0}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MEMBER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_CODE, ID, PW, NICKNAME, MBTI_CODE) VALUES(MEM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{pw}, #{nickname}, #{mbti_code})
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_CODE, ID, PW, NICKNAME, MBTI_CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_CODE IN (SELECT MEM_CODE FROM MEMBER_APPLY M JOIN ROLE_COMP R ON M.RC_CODE = R.RC_CODE WHERE AP_CODE = #{arg0} AND MR_CODE = #{arg1})

SELECT MEM_CODE, ID, PW, NICKNAME, MBTI_CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_CODE IN (SELECT MEM_CODE FROM MEMBER_APPLY M JOIN ROLE_COMP R ON M.RC_CODE = R.RC_CODE WHERE AP_CODE = 'AP0006' AND MR_CODE = 'MR0002')
